    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
In a pulsating encounter between Espanyol and Real, the visitors managed to overwhelm the home side with a dominant 4-1 victory. The game unfolded with a series of impactful moments that started from the very first whistle and continued relentlessly until the final seconds of the match.

The game kicked off with Real on the front foot, asserting their dominance almost immediately. Within the first 30 seconds, Real managed to advance play significantly but the ball was swiftly put out of play. Espanyol, eager to gain control, committed a foul just as the game was regaining momentum, setting the stage for a persistent tussle for dominance throughout the first half.

The initial exchanges were scrappy; Real's offside in the opening minute demonstrated their aggressive approach. Espanyol, however, couldn't capitalize on the subsequent free-kick, as both teams struggled to find their rhythms. Espanyolâ€™s indirect free-kick led nowhere, and soon the ball was out of play again. The game saw much of the action in these early minutes characterized by fouls and throw-ins.

By the seventh minute, Real showed their attacking intent with a shot on target. This move injected some urgency into their game, ultimately leading to the first corner of the match. Real, however, were caught offside again, nullifying their attacking threat temporarily. Despite numerous attempts by both sides to break the deadlock, control of the game changed hands frequently due to the continued sequence of fouls and clearances.

Midway through the first half, Real were starting to find their stride. A shot off target in the 12th minute showed their intentions, yet Espanyol were resilient, pushing back and creating their own threats. Espanyol soon retaliated with a shot on target of their own in the 16th minute. This back-and-forth pattern kept the defense lines busy on both sides, and the goalkeepers had their work cut out to ensure the game stayed goalless at this stage.

A moment of discipline issues arose around the 17th minute when Espanyol were booked for a foul, earning them a yellow card and presenting Real with an indirect free-kick. Real, sensing an opportunity, surged forward once more, only to see their efforts miss the target. Espanyol's defense, although sporadically breached, managed to execute crucial clearances each time.

The pattern of play continued with Espanyol committing fouls, allowing Real to build attacks through indirect free-kicks. Such moments were spurned by missed shots or clearances by the Espanyol defense. Conversely, anytime Espanyol conjured an attacking move, Real's defense responded with solid clearances and interceptions.

It was in the 44th minute that Real broke the deadlock, showcasing a decisive piece of play that saw them net the opening goal. This was a pivotal moment in the game, thrusting Real into the lead just before halftime, a psychological blow to Espanyol.

Espanyol started the second half seeking redemption with a renewed focus and intent. Their early efforts saw shots miss the target, causing little trouble for Real's defenders. Real's clearance in the opening minutes highlighted their intent to defend their lead staunchly. 

Real, on the other hand, were not just focused on defense; they fired a shot on target within four minutes of the second half starting. Espanyol followed this with multiple attempts of their own, missing narrowly each time in a frantic bid to level the score. The visitors managed to slow down the game through tactical fouls and indirect free-kicks, stemming the tide of Espanyol's spirited offenses.

The game's physical nature continued to be evident as both teams committed fouls to disrupt each other's play. A significant moment occurred in the 9th minute of this half when Espanyol were booked, handing Real another direct free-kick. Real tried to convert this chance but missed the target. Each missed opportunity from Real gave Espanyol a glimmer of hope that they could get back into the game.

As the second half progressed, substitutions began to come thick and fast, as both coaches tried to inject fresh energy into their respective teams. These changes temporarily affected the rhythm of the game with brief periods of disjointed play. 

Espanyol, despite their resolve, conceded another goal in the 14th minute of the second half. Real doubled their lead, taking the game to 2-0, and showcasing their clinical edge in front of the goal. This goal was a hammer blow to Espanyol, who kicked off once again with the uphill task of overturning the deficit.

Real's confidence was now palpable, as they went on to pepper the Espanyol goal with more shots on target. Espanyol, out of desperation, earned themselves a goal in the 27th minute to make the scoreline 3-1, offering a brief respite and an injection of hope to the home fans.

However, Real were not to be outdone. They responded almost immediately, continuing their siege on Espanyolâ€™s goal. Their persistence paid off once again as they found the back of the net in the 33rd minute, restoring their three-goal advantage. Espanyolâ€™s defense was caught napping, and Real exploited the lapse with surgical precision.

This goal seemed to knock the wind out of Espanyol, whose task became near insurmountable. Their frustration manifested in further fouls, leading to Real capitalizing yet again in the dying embers of the game. Real scored their fourth goal in the 45th minute of the second half, rounding off an emphatic display and sealing a comprehensive victory with an exclamation mark.

At the final whistle, Realâ€™s clinical execution in front of goal and their disciplined defensive performance marked the difference. Despite Espanyol's fervent efforts and a fighting spirit shown in patches, Real's ability to capitalize on key moments and maintain pressure proved too much. 

Real's victory was built on a foundation of relentless pressing, strategic fouling when necessary to break up the play, and taking their chances with ruthless efficiency. Espanyol, meanwhile, were left ruing missed opportunities and defensive lapses that cost them dearly. Both sides displayed moments of individual brilliance but it was Realâ€™s cohesive team performance that shone through.

The game highlighted the unpredictable nature of football - despite Espanyol showing some promise in the early exchanges, they failed to translate possession into substantial threats. Real's tactical nous and clinical execution were on display, ultimately earning them a well-deserved victory. This game will be remembered for Real's scintillating attacking display and their steadfast defense, encapsulating the essence of their dominance on the day.
